comments.body: if You are using this approach You can also pass `ENVIRONMENT_MODE` here
generally frontend bundle shouldn't have this information, however for developement time You can leave it
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -70,6 +72,9 @@ module.exports = {
             hash: false,
             template: srcPath + "/index.html",
             filename: "index.html"
+        }),
+        new webpack.DefinePlugin({
+            ENVIRONMENT_MODE: JSON.stringify(ENVIRONMENT_MODE)
